pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Non- And Semi-Parametric Model Fitting // MCMC algorithms processing functions for: 1. single response multiple regression, see Papageorgiou, G. (2018) doi: 10.32614/RJ-2018-069, 2. multivariate response multiple regression, with nonparametric models for the means, the variances and the correlation matrix, with variable selection, see Papageorgiou, G. and Marshall, B. C. (2020) doi: 10.1080/10618600.2020.1739534, 3. joint mean-covariance models for multivariate responses, see Papageorgiou, G. (2020), and 4.Dirichlet process mixtures, see Papageorgiou, G. (2019) doi: 10.1111/anzs.12273.
